title: Unable to import partial blockchain
body:
I am trying to import a part of the blockchain I exported from my another machine but the import fails saying it's a bad block
#### System information

Geth version: 1.5
OS & Version: OSX 10.11.4
Commit hash : a4c4125b
#### Expected behaviour

geth --testnet import backup

Should import the blockchain from file named backup
#### Actual behaviour

Backup fails with: 
Bad block #1561911 (0xb74225334e2da1a7e5f05d2bcf95565b1dac3c28ef8fa671f002b8a4f67dec7d)
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

On machine 1: geth --testnet export backup 1561910 1700000

Copy backup to machine 2
On machine 2: geth --testnet import backup
#### Backtrace

I1009 11:31:39.045852 ethdb/database.go:82] Allotted 128MB cache and 1024 file handles to /Users/userme/Library/Ethereum/testnet/chaindata
I1009 11:31:39.209263 core/blockchain.go:204] Last header: #1561910 [e74d5ec4…] TD=373991494463761
I1009 11:31:39.209310 core/blockchain.go:205] Last block: #1561910 [e74d5ec4…] TD=373991494463761
I1009 11:31:39.209326 core/blockchain.go:206] Fast block: #1561910 [e74d5ec4…] TD=373991494463761
I1009 11:31:39.210828 cmd/utils/cmd.go:123] Importing blockchain backup
E1009 11:31:45.164179 core/blockchain.go:1135] Bad block #1561911 (0xb74225334e2da1a7e5f05d2bcf95565b1dac3c28ef8fa671f002b8a4f67dec7d)
E1009 11:31:45.164232 core/blockchain.go:1136]     invalid receipt root hash. received=91d6c2438cc0ef7752c8a4f82f8ab7385b6dede88eb344cae2a107a3e506d6fd calculated=bae7639057bd1631f2a284e0b2a93e540dd9771b77f1c10f9fd283d0d68bf1d8
I1009 11:31:45.180218 ethdb/database.go:169] closed db:/Users/userme/Library/Ethereum/testnet/chaindata
Fatal: Import error: invalid block 2500: invalid receipt root hash. received=91d6c2438cc0ef7752c8a4f82f8ab7385b6dede88eb344cae2a107a3e506d6fd calculated=bae7639057bd1631f2a284e0b2a93e540dd9771b77f1c10f9fd283d0d68bf1d8
